= iRINGTools Components =

[http://code.google.com/p/iring-tools/downloads/detail?name=iRINGTools-111.zip iRINGTools] is comprised of:
  * *[http://code.google.com/p/iring-tools/downloads/detail?name=iRINGAdapter-111.zip iRINGTools Adapter]*
    * *Adapter Service* - WCF REST Service for converting legacy systems to ISO 15026 and pulling data from ISO 15926 into legacy systems.
    * *Interface Service* - [http://www.joseki.org Joseki] SPARQL Protocol server packaged for use as ISO 15926 instance data endpoint.
    * *Mapping Editor* - Silverlight application for mapping legacy systems to ISO 15926.
    * *Tools*
      *  *!AdapterClient* - simple desktop client for making Pull requests.
      *  *!EncryptCredentials* - command line tool for encrypting credentials in web.configs
  * *[http://code.google.com/p/iring-tools/downloads/detail?name=iRINGSandbox-111.zip iRINGTools Sandbox]*
    * *Reference Data Service* - WCF REST Service providing federated query across multiple ISO 15926 reference data endpoints.
    * *Sandbox Service* - [http://www.joseki.org Joseki] SPARQL Protocol server packaged for use as ISO 15926 reference data endpoint.
    * *Reference Data Editor* Silverlight application for browsing ISO 15926 reference data
    * *Tools*
      * *QMXFGenerator* - command line tool for generating QMXF from a spreadsheet.
